channel.title: Quantum Optimization on Aniruddha Bapat
channel.description: Recent content in Quantum Optimization on Aniruddha Bapat

item.title: Design and Optimization in Near-Term Quantum Computation
Quantum approximate optimization of the long-range Ising model with a trapped-ion quantum simulator
item.description: We implement a variational quantum algorithm (QAOA) to approximate the ground-state energy of a long-range Ising model, both quantum and classical, and investigating the algorithm performance on a trapped-ion quantum simulator with up to 40 qubits.
